verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry, God. Listen \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* prayer.

\w From|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* end \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth, \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H8085"\w* \w call|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H8085"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H8085"\w* overwhelmed. Lead \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* rock \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H8085"\w* higher than \w I|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* have been \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H6697"\w* tower \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* enemy.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* tent forever. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w shelter|strong="H4268"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* wings. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w For|strong="H5643"\w* \w you|strong="H5769"\w*, God, have heard my vows. \w You|strong="H5769"\w* have \w given|strong="H5643"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H1481"\w* heritage \w of|strong="H3671"\w* those who \w fear|strong="H1481"\w* \w your|strong="H5769"\w* name.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* prolong \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king’s life. \w His|strong="H5414"\w* years \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* generations.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* enthroned \w in|strong="H8141"\w* God’s \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* \w forever|strong="H1755"\w*. Appoint \w your|strong="H5921"\w* loving kindness \w and|strong="H4428"\w* truth, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* preserve \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H2617"\w* sing \w praise|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* name \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w that|strong="H5769"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* may fulfill \w my|strong="H6440"\w* vows daily.
